languages.text: {n}Кровь попадает в глаза, вы шипите от боли, но все же поднимаете голову. Сквозь красную пелену в лике Императора вы зрите суровую истину: смерть видит вас. Смерть следит.{/n}
{n}Blood falls into your eyes. You hiss in pain, but raise your head. Through a red mist, you glimpse a harsh truth in the Emperor's face: death sees you. Death is watching you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кровь попадает в глаза, вы шипите от боли, но все же поднимаете голову. Сквозь красную пелену в лике Императора вы зрите суровую истину: смерть видит вас. Смерть следит.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Blood gets into your eyes. Despite hissing with pain, you raise your head. Through a red mist, you glimpse a harsh truth in the Undying One's face: death sees you. Death is watching you."
{n}Blood gets into your eyes. Despite hissing with pain, you raise your head. Through a red mist, you glimpse a harsh truth in the Undying One's face: death sees you. Death is watching you."
{n}Blood falls into your eyes. You hiss in pain, but raise your head. Through a red mist, you glimpse a harsh truth in the Undying One's face: Death sees you. Death is watching you.{/n}
{n}Blood falls into your eyes. You hiss in pain, but raise your head. Through a red mist, you glimpse a harsh truth in the Undying One's face: Death sees you. Death is watching you.{/n}
{n}Blood falls into your eyes. You hiss in pain, but raise your head. Through a red mist, you glimpse a harsh truth in the Emperor's face: death sees you. Death is watching you.{/n}
{n}Blood falls into your eyes. You hiss in pain, but raise your head. Through a red mist, you glimpse a harsh truth in the Emperor's face: death sees you. Death is watching you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Blut tropft dir in die Augen. Du zischst vor Schmerz auf, hebst aber den Kopf. Durch einen roten Nebel erkennst du im Antlitz des Imperators eine brutale Wahrheit: Der Tod sieht dich. Der Tod beobachtet dich.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Blood falls into your eyes. You hiss in pain, but raise your head. Through a red mist, you glimpse a harsh truth in the Emperor's face: death sees you. Death is watching you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Blut tropft dir in die Augen. Du zischst vor Schmerz auf, hebst aber den Kopf. Durch einen roten Nebel erkennst du im Antlitz des Todlosen eine gnadenlose Wahrheit: Der Tod sieht dich. Der Tod beobachtet dich.{/n}

languages.text: {n}La sangre llena tus ojos. Siseas de dolor, pero levantas la cabeza. A través de una neblina roja, ves una verdad dura en la cara del Emperador: la muerte te ve. La muerte te observa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Blood falls into your eyes. You hiss in pain, but raise your head. Through a red mist, you glimpse a harsh truth in the Emperor's face: death sees you. Death is watching you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La sangre llena tus ojos. Siseas de dolor, pero levantas la cabeza. A través de una neblina roja, ves una verdad dura en la cara del Inmortal: la muerte te ve. La muerte te observa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}血があなたの目に落ちてくる。痛みに声を上げるが、頭を上げた。赤い霧の中で、あなたは皇帝の顔に酷薄な真実を垣間見る。死はあなたを見る。死はあなたを覗いているのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Blood falls into your eyes. You hiss in pain, but raise your head. Through a red mist, you glimpse a harsh truth in the Emperor's face: death sees you. Death is watching you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}血があなたの目に落ちてくる。痛みに声を上げるが、頭を上げた。赤い霧の中で、あなたは不死の者の顔に酷薄な真実を垣間見る。死はあなたを見る。死はあなたを覗いているのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}鲜血流进你的眼睛，你发出了痛苦的嘶嘶声，但你依然抬起了头。透过眼前的红雾，你瞥见帝皇脸上冰冷的真理——死亡看到了你，死亡正在凝视着你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Blood falls into your eyes. You hiss in pain, but raise your head. Through a red mist, you glimpse a harsh truth in the Emperor's face: death sees you. Death is watching you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}鲜血流进你的眼睛，你发出了痛苦的嘶嘶声，但你依然抬起了头。透过眼前的红雾，你瞥见不死之神脸上冰冷的真理——死亡看到了你，死亡正在凝视着你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du sang s'écoule dans vos yeux. La douleur vous arrache un sifflement, mais vous parvenez néanmoins à relever la tête. À travers une brume rouge, vous discernez une cruelle vérité sur les traits de l'Empereur : la mort vous voit. Plus encore, elle vous observe.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Blood falls into your eyes. You hiss in pain, but raise your head. Through a red mist, you glimpse a harsh truth in the Emperor's face: death sees you. Death is watching you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du sang s'écoule dans vos yeux. La douleur vous arrache un sifflement, mais vous parvenez néanmoins à relever la tête. À travers une brume rouge, vous discernez une cruelle vérité sur les traits de l'Immortel : la mort vous voit. Plus encore, elle vous observe.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kan, gözlerine damlıyor. Acıyla tıslasan da başını kaldırıyorsun. Kızıl bir pus içinden göz ucuyla İmparator'un yüzündeki acımasız hakikati görüyorsun: Ölüm seni görüyor. Ölüm seni izliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Blood falls into your eyes. You hiss in pain, but raise your head. Through a red mist, you glimpse a harsh truth in the Emperor's face: death sees you. Death is watching you.{/n}
